survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the work-life balance challenges and satisfaction levels among freelancers across various industries.

questions.question_text: How many years have you been working as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover a broad range of experience levels.

script.question_text: How many years have you been working as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary industry as a freelancer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary industry as a freelancer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your current work-life balance as a freelancer? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice response. Label endpoints clearly for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE), displayed horizontally for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your current work-life balance as a freelancer? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face in maintaining work-life balance as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text (OPEN_TEXT) with character limit.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face in maintaining work-life balance as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: Do you use any tools or strategies to manage your work-life balance? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to uncover practical solutions. Optional field but valuable for insights.

script.question_text: Do you use any tools or strategies to manage your work-life balance? If yes, please describe.
